nodes.text: The haneli flower was a type of flower that grew on Haneli. It could be used to make a potent tea, but had other uses. When drought hit Haneli, the flowers became rarer and their price increased, making them difficult to purchase. One of Izal Garsea's professors on Eroudac hired her to smuggle haneli flowers, but Garsea was caught, and was forced to drop the cargo.
